hero.title: Welcome to Arcstratus
hero.subtitle: Hey there, I'm Wenke!
hero.description: A tech enthusiast and cloud architect who loves tackling challenges. Whether you’re dreaming of custom software, building your cloud empire, or diving into the wild world of AI, I’m your go-to partner!

features.title: What Can I Do for You?

items.title: Tailor-Made User Experiences
items.description: Not every business fits off-the-shelf software! I’ll craft digital tools just for you, from sleek websites to complex management systems, designed to match your unique needs.

items.title: Future-Ready Cloud Solutions
items.description: Cloud isn’t just a buzzword—it’s a game-changer for saving costs and boosting efficiency! I’ll design a cloud architecture that’s smooth, secure, and saves you big on hardware.

items.title: Adventure in AI
items.description: Ready to give your business an AI edge? No need for a huge tech team—I’ll assess, design, and build AI solutions that put you ahead of the curve!

cta.title: Got an Idea?
cta.subtitle: Ready to bring your vision to life or just have a few questions?

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Innovative solutions designed to meet your business needs

unitobuy.title: What's Missing? You Buy
unitobuy.description: "You Buy" is every family's shopping assistant, making shopping easy and accurate. Upload photos, record voice notes, and sync lists effortlessly. Turn "panicked dads" into shopping experts and reliable partners.

islandVoice.title: Island Voice
islandVoice.description: Island Voice is dedicated to documenting the words, screenshots, and videos of Taiwanese public figures, creating a transparent and trustworthy archival platform.

service1.title: Product Design
service1.description: From concept to prototype, we design products that users love

service2.title: Software Outsourcing
service2.description: Dedicated development teams to bring your ideas to life

service3.title: Cloud Architecture
service3.description: Design and implementation of scalable cloud infrastructure

service4.title: DevOps & Maintenance
service4.description: Ongoing support and maintenance to ensure your systems run smoothly

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with reliable, scalable, and secure technology solutions that drive innovation and growth.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading provider of cloud and software solutions, recognized for our expertise, reliability, and customer-centric approach.

value1.title: Innovation
value1.description: We constantly explore new technologies and approaches to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

value2.title: Excellence
value2.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from code quality to customer service.

value3.title: Collaboration
value3.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and partnership with our clients.

value4.title: Integrity
value4.description: We operate with transparency, honesty, and ethical standards in all our interactions.

news.title: Latest News
news.subtitle: Stay updated with our latest developments and industry insights

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

careers.title: 職缺
careers.description: 加入我們的團隊，一起改變未來
